settings.card_heading: Have a great design idea for your exclusive Oceanus piece?
settings.card_paragraph: Work with our team of stylists and designers to elevate your swimwear game with our bespoke custom swim & apparel designs tailored to your unique style - simply pick one of our shapes and send us your ideas for it.

From custom prints to incredible embellishments, we bring your vision to life with premium fabrics and meticulous craftsmanship. Stand out on the shore with swimwear as individual as you are. Dive into luxury today!

•⁠ ⁠Pick your own embellishment or print on any swimwear we run
•⁠ ⁠⁠Get custom made Swimwear for your Bachelorette Or Birthday party
•⁠ ⁠⁠Personalise your own Oceanus Swimsuit with your name, initials or slogan for you and your team
Email our team for more info at: info@oceanusswimwear.com

settings.heading: Bespoke Custom Designs, Just For You

settings.text:
For her “Mafia Chic” Wedding In Sicily, we partnered with Jaime to create her dream custom swimsuit.

 

“I had the most amazing swimsuit made by my favourite brand, Oceanus. They incorporated our J emblem sketched by Tim Rockins.”
